Future Study Education Consulting – Sizn: Future Study Education Consulting – Your Path to the Future!

Biz Turkiyaning eng yaxshi universitetla: We have direct partnerships with the best universities in Turkey. Our partners include Istanbul Kent University, Marmara University, Beykoz University, and more than 30 other universities.

Akademik muvaffaqiyat uchun poydevor qo': Laying the foundation for academic success: A crucial step in transitioning to university
Turk tili ko'nikmalarini rivojlantirish: Developing Turkish language skills and language education support:
Ona tili turk tili bo'lmagan talabalar u: For students whose native language is not Turkish, knowing Turkish is very important for those who want to study at universities in Turkey. Various Turkish language support programs are offered to help these students improve their language skills. These programs aim to enable students to use Turkish effectively as an academic language and are usually provided by universities.
Oliy ta’lim muassasalari qabul jarayonid: Higher education institutions organize language proficiency exams to check the level of students' knowledge of the languages of instruction during the admission process. These exams assess students' understanding of academic texts and their ability to communicate effectively. Students who are found to be deficient are directed to preparatory programs to improve their language skills.
Turkiyadagi ta'lim muassasalari talabala: Educational institutions in Turkey offer students the opportunity to receive education in various foreign languages such as English, French, and German. These opportunities allow students to access additional language courses that improve their language skills and support their academic success. These language teaching programs are usually designed intensively and last for one academic year.
Tilga tayyorgarlik dasturlari talabalarg: Language preparation programs offer comprehensive training to help students succeed in academic languages. These programs encourage students to actively participate in classes, complete assignments on time, and make effective use of the offered study materials. By the end of the program, students are expected to have the language proficiency necessary to continue their further education.
Turkiya xalqaro talabalarga turli tillar: Turkey aims to become a global focal point in the field of education by offering international students the opportunity to receive education in various languages. Although Turkish is the main language of instruction, universities offer a global academic experience with multiple language options.
Chet elda ta’lim olish – hayotdagi eng m: Studying abroad is one of the most important stages in life. Moving to a new country, adapting to the environment, and dealing with documentation processes can sometimes be complicated. Especially for students going abroad for the first time, this process can be challenging. As Future Study.uz, we not only ensure your admission to the university but also provide full support from your first days in Turkey.
Bizning TRANSFER VA JOYLASHUV XIZMATIMIZ: Our TRANSFER AND ACCOMMODATION SERVICE allows you to quickly adapt to the new environment, avoid difficulties related to documentation, and have comfortable and safe living conditions. Below, you can find detailed information about the services we offer:
Siz o‘qish uchun xorijga jo‘nab ketayotg: When you are leaving for studying abroad, the Future Study.uz team will see you off at Tashkent International Airport. We will check your necessary documents and provide advice to ensure there are no problems on the way.
Siz Istanbulga yetib kelganingizda, sizn: When you arrive in Istanbul, we provide a meeting service at a pre-agreed location. For a student arriving in a foreign country for the first time, exiting the airport, finding transportation, and reaching the destination can be a bit challenging. Therefore, we will meet you at the airport and help with your luggage if necessary.
Siz Istanbul aeroportiga yetib kelganing: After you arrive at Istanbul airport, we will provide comfortable transportation to your university or accommodation. Getting familiar with the transportation system in a new environment and reaching the correct destination can sometimes take time. Therefore, we will facilitate your movement.
TURKIYADA YASHASH VA MOSLASHUV XIZMATLAR: LIVING AND ADAPTATION SERVICES IN TURKEY
4. Sim-karta va zarur jihozlar bilan ta’: 4. Providing SIM cards and necessary equipment
Yangi davlatga kelganingizda, sizga aloq: When you arrive in a new country, it is important to establish communication and use the internet. We will help you choose the most convenient tariffs from local operators and advise you on purchasing a SIM card, and if necessary, a laptop or other technical equipment.
5. Universitet bilan tanishtirish va huj: 5. Introduction to the university and documentation
Universitetga kirish hujjatlari bilan bo: We fully support the processes related to university admission documents. We will take you to the university, introduce you to the administration, help you submit the necessary documents, and provide the necessary instructions to ensure all processes run smoothly.
6. Turkiyada yashash uchun ruxsatnoma (i: 6. Obtaining a residence permit (ikamet) in Turkey
Turkiyada uzoq muddat yashash uchun ikam: To live in Turkey for a long time, it is required to obtain a residence permit (ikamet). This process can sometimes be complicated and time-consuming. Future Study.uz will prepare all the documents for you, submit them to the Goc Administration (migration office), and expedite the process of obtaining the permit.
Yangi davlatda eng katta muammolardan bi: One of the biggest problems in a new country is finding accommodation. Students often fall for scams or rent expensive houses, incurring extra costs. We will find you affordable and comfortable accommodation without involving brokers. We also help with all the paperwork related to renting a house.
8. Universitet jadvaliga mos ish topishd: 8. Assistance in finding a job that fits the university schedule
Turkiyada o‘qish bilan birga ishlashni r: Are you planning to work while studying in Turkey? We help you find a job that fits your university schedule. Based on our experience, we recommend the best options when choosing a job. Our students have the opportunity to earn an average of $900 or more per month.
Turkiyada o‘qish bir nechta jihatdan foy: Studying in Turkey is beneficial in several ways. The quality of education is high, but the cost is much lower compared to other countries. There are many scholarship programs, which provide significant financial relief. Living conditions are comfortable and prices are also suitable for students. Due to cultural proximity, adaptation is easier. Additionally, there are wide opportunities to gain international experience and work in various countries.
Universitetlarda zamonaviy o‘quv dasturl: Universities use modern curricula and advanced technologies. The diploma is recognized internationally, which helps in finding a good job in the future. Student accommodations, transportation, and overall living expenses are relatively cheap. Additionally, there are many discounts and benefits for students. The climate is pleasant, and the lifestyle is similar to ours, which helps in quickly adapting to the new environment.
Student life is very active and interesting. There are many student clubs, scientific conferences, cultural events, and sports competitions at universities. Libraries are open until late, and there are many cafes and recreational areas for students. The transportation system is developed, and there are special discounts for students. Additionally, there are opportunities for work and internships. Various festivals, trips, and the chance to make friends with international students make life even more exciting.
O‘qish sifatli ta’lim, arzon yashash, bo: Studying stands out with quality education, affordable living, rich culture, and wide opportunities for students. Adaptation is easy, and there are high chances of gaining international experience and finding a good job in the future. Student life is lively, interesting, and active.
Har bir mavzu bo'yicha sizni qiziqtirgan: Questions you are interested in for each topic

Iltimos, elektron pochta to'g'riligini t: Please check the accuracy of your email

Ariza topshirish uchun qanday hujjatlar: What documents are required for application
Ariza topshirish uchun odatda pasport ma: Usually, passport information, transcripts, references, and language proficiency certificates are required for application. You can find detailed information in the application form
Ariza topshirish jarayoni qancha davom e: How long does the application process take
Ariza berish muddati tanlangan universit: The application period may vary depending on the selected university, program requirements, and application deadline. Usually, the process takes a few days
Viza jarayonlarida yordam olsam bo'ladim: Can I get help with the visa process
Ha, biz viza jarayoni bo'yicha yo'l-yo'r: Yes, we offer guidance and assistance with the visa process. We provide detailed information about the necessary documents and procedures
Mening arizamning qabul qilinishi nimaga: What does the acceptance of my application depend on
Sizning arizangiz siz tanlagan universit: The acceptance of your application depends on the admission criteria of the university you choose, the completeness and accuracy of the application documents, and their compliance with the requirements
Ariza muddatlari universitetlar va dastu: Application deadlines vary depending on universities and programs. Usually, you can apply for the fall and spring semesters
Ariza toʻlovi universitetlar va dasturla: The application fee varies depending on universities and programs. Some charge a fee, while others may offer free applications.
Qabul qilish uchun til bilish sertifikat: What is the language proficiency certificate for admission?
Tilni bilish sertifikati afzal ko'rgan d: The language proficiency certificate may vary depending on the language requirements set by the preferred program and university. Usually, international exam results such as IELTS or TOEFL are accepted.
Malumot xatini qanday olishim mumkin: How can I get a reference letter
Malumotnomalar o'qituvchilar, akademikla: References can be written by teachers, academics, or employers. There may be a specific format for writing the letter, and you should pay attention to these details
Qanday qilib arizamni to'ldirishim mumki: How can I fill out my application?
Anketani to'liq va to'g'ri to'ldirganing: After you have filled out the form completely and correctly, you can complete your application by attaching the required documents and making the payment
Agar mening arizam qabul qilinsa nima bo: What happens if my application is accepted
Qabul qilish maqomi siz tanlagan univers: The admission status depends on the evaluation of the university of your choice. In case of admission, you will be sent the necessary information and the registration process will begin
